name: Passed Resources
queries: sum(cluster_policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", kind=~"$kind", source=~"$source", status="pass" }) by (policy,rule,kind,name,status,severity,category,source)

name: Failed Resources
queries: sum(cluster_policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", status="fail" }) by (policy,rule,kind,name,status,severity,category,source)

name: Warning Resources
queries: sum(cluster_policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", status="warn" }) by (policy,rule,kind,name,status,severity,category,source )

name: Errored Resources
queries: sum(cluster_policy_report_result{policy=~"$policy", category=~"$category", severity=~"$severity", source=~"$source", kind=~"$kind", status="warn" }) by (policy,rule,kind,name,status,severity,category,source)
